name: Chronicles of Galdurvale
description:
Play as Amelia Moonglow in this action-adventure game set in the mysterious and amazing world of Galdurvale; filled with secrets, ancient and environmental puzzles, fearsome enemies of all types and sizes. Help Amelia find the 5 powerful gemstones to unlock the Sky World above where legend tells of dragons and floating islands.


Explore the world of Galdurvale: walk, run, jump, swim and even fly. Help Amelia across the vast deserts of Deadbone Desert, through the wetlands of Bogbelly Swamp and explore deep into the caverns below.



Fight enemies of all types: great beasts, bandits, creatures and powerful warlocks. Equipped with her powerful armband, Amelia will be able to perform powerful skills; and in addition, Amelia is a seasoned sword-fighter and trained with the bow since young.





Find and collect many different swords and bows, granting Amelia unique attacks. The world of Galdurvale is buried with hidden secrets new and old, build Amelia's magical knowledge to help gain access to untouched places.
